A

ActionBarManager - Klasse in net.chaossquad.mclib.actionbar.manager
Solves the problem of handling multiple actionbars at once.
With Audience.sendActionBar(Component), one actionbar would remove another actionbar.
With the ActionBarManager, it is possible to display multiple actionbars at once.
